techmeme.title: The US SEC drops its investigation into Paxos over its BUSD stablecoin, after sending Paxos a Wells notice in February 2023 (Leo Schwartz/Fortune)
UK government data: digital industry job growth grew just 0.3% in 2023, the lowest since a 0.1% decline in 2013, down from 4.1% growth in 2022 and 6.5% in 2021 (Isabella Ward/Bloomberg)
Fireworks AI, which helps companies fine-tune and customize AI models, raised $52M led by Sequoia at a $552M valuation, taking its total funding to $77M (Paayal Zaveri/Bloomberg)

Silicon Valley Defense Group: the US federal government spent $22B on tech from the top 100 national security startups, a paltry sum and far below VC investment (Heather Somerville/Wall Street Journal)
IDC estimates that Apple will sell under 500K Vision Pro units in 2024, and the headset's international launch will offset a 75% QoQ drop in US sales in Q3 2024 (Vlad Savov/Bloomberg)
